posts.post_content: Pretty clean group apart from the usual tobacco stains. No back damage. Average condition is about VG (technical grade a tiny bit lower; eye appeal a tiny bit higher).
Would be interested in a couple individually

Pictures of individual cards are available on request if you include an email address or phone number.
